t.val: It looks like you already have this game open. Please check or log out and back in to fix the issue.

Get 5 Sun Disc Scatters to trigger the Aztec Gold Cash Respins feature. Start with 3 Aztec Gold Cash Respins and if another Sun Disc Scatter lands in view the number of respins will reset to 3. Watch out for the Mini, Major and Mega Sun Disc Scatters for even bigger wins. Fill an entire reel to activate the multiplier for all Sun Disc Scatters on that reel. When the Aztec Gold Cash Respins end all Sun Disc Scatter values in view will be paid. Sun Disc values will be multiplied by Total Bet.

FILL AN ENTIRE COLUMN TO WIN THE MULTIPLIER
WATCH OUT FOR MINI, MAJOR AND MEGA SUN DISC SCATTERS!
Each spin can have up to 117,649 ways to win!
Wins are awarded on left to right adjacent symbols regardless of size starting on reel 1.
You don’t have enough credit to make that bet. Please try a lower bet or visit the Cashier.

Select the COIN VALUE that you want to use. This game is a MEGAWAYS™ slot with up to 117,649 winning ways. Each spin will cost 20 x selected coin value. Press on SPIN to start the game. Use AUTO SPIN to set your own automatic play settings. All winnings are paid from left to right except for SUN DISC SCATTERS. Symbol wins are as per paytable, regardless of the size of the symbols.

CREDIT indicates the amount of credit available according to the COIN VALUE you choose. BALANCE indicates the amount of real money available. BET indicates the amount that you will bet on the next spin. WIN indicates the amount won in the previous games and it is already multiplied by the selected coin value.
Payouts shown are in coins. All payouts will be multiplied by the selected coin value.
All wins begin with the left most reel and pay left to right on consecutive reels, except Sun Disc Scatter which pays any.
Payments and game activity will be void in the event of malfunction.

THE WINNING SYMBOL PAYOUT IS MULTIPLIED BY THE NUMBER OF WINNING WAYS TO GIVE THE TOTAL WIN:
